column1: However, the Electrical Superintendent of the Ratnapura Municipal Council adduced evidence and
said in Cross-Examination that “2වි2 ගල්ඛණය ඉදිරිපත් කර තිගබන්ගන් එච්. ගේමරත්න 94.05.27 දින
ගෙවා තිගබන්ගන්”. According to the evidence of the said Witness, Premaratne the Appellant has
paid Rs. 10, 000/- out of the arrears of the Electricity Bills of Rs. 24, 337/- on 27.06.1994. It is to
be noted that this date is after the filing of the information.
